Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Managing Editor - IZA Journal of Migration
Co-Editor IZA Prize Book Series "Demand for Labor – The Neglected Side of the Market" by Daniel Hamermesh

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Organizer: IZA Workshop on Frontiers in Labor Economics
Organizer: IZA/CEPR European Summer Symposium in Labour Economics
Organizer: IZA and Center on Human Capital Workshop on Migration and Human Capital
Panelist at the European and Social Committee Conference "Immigration: A source of wealth and duties for Europe"
Panelist at the European Economic and Social Committee “Labour Migration and Mobility in the European Union”
Keynote at the International Workshop "Migrants: Transnational Entrepreneurs or Entrepreneurial Refugees?" Maastricht School of Management
Organizer: IZA/World Bank Conference: Employment and Development
Organizer: IZA/RAND Workshop: Mapping Diasporas in the European Union and the United States
Panelist at the ETUI-ETUC Conference "Europe at a crossroads. Which way to quality jobs and prosperity?"
Keynote at the "Meeting of the Advisory Committee on Free movement of workers", European Commission Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion DG
Keynote speaker at OECD expert meeting "Assessing the economic contribution of labour migration in developing countries as countries of destination"

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Background paper for the World Bank "2013 World Development Report" (team member). "Youth Unemployment and Vocational Training", appeared as IZA Discussion Paper 6890

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: 2013 Emerald Literati Network Highly Commended Award

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Research Fellow - ESRC Centre for Population Change
Affiliated Scholar - POP Centre for Population, Development and Labour Economics - UNU-MERIT

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Demonstrator. Teaching of courses: Labour Economics (UG), Introduction to Stata (MSc), Preliminary Mathematics and Statistics (MSc), Applied Microeconomics (UG), Mathematics for Economics (UG)
Temporary Lecturer. Teaching of courses: Introduction to Maths for Economists (UG), Quantitative Methods (MSc)

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Coordinator of "Europe Meets China: Images of contemporary China". Leader of study group working on the Rural Urban Migration in China (RUMiC) dataset. Funded by European Commission under Marie-Curie Actions

European Coordinator of "Migration and the Reshaping of Consumption Patterns". Funded by DFG/ESRC/ANR/NSFC. Consortium: IZA, University of Southampton, University of Nottingham, CNRS, Beijing Normal University, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Co-leader on "Study on Active Inclusion of Migrants". Funded by European Commission
Co-leader of "The Integration of Migrants and its E ects on the Labour Market". Funded by European Parliament
Co-Principal Investigator of "Mapping diasporas in the EU and the US". Funded by European Commission. Co-lead with RAND Europe
